title: Danny Kaye
summary: Danny Kaye (born David Daniel Kaminsky; Yiddish: דוד־דניאל קאַמינסקי‎; January 18, 1911 – March 3, 1987) was an American actor, singer, dancer, comedian, musician, philanthropist, and cook. His performances featured physical comedy, idiosyncratic pantomimes, and rapid-fire novelty songs.
